name: Laptop
description: Sleek and powerful laptop featuring a quad-core i5 processor, 8GB RAM, 256GB SSD, and a 14-inch FHD display, perfect for everyday tasks and professional work.

name: Smartphone
description: Advanced smartphone with a vibrant 6.2-inch display, 12MP dual camera, 128GB internal storage, and a long-lasting 4000mAh battery, designed for modern multitasking.

name: Wireless Headphones
description: Premium wireless headphones with crystal clear sound, over-ear design, 20 hours of battery life, and a modern, sleek black finish, ideal for music lovers.

name: Smartwatch
description: Stylish and functional smartwatch with a 1.3-inch AMOLED display, water-resistant build, advanced fitness tracking, and a polished silver design, perfect for health enthusiasts.

name: Speakers
description: Portable wireless speakers delivering immersive sound with powerful bass, long-lasting battery, and a compact design for enjoying music on the go.

name: Television
description: 32-inch Smart TV with Full HD resolution, vibrant display, smart features, and compatibility with popular streaming apps, perfect for home entertainment.

name: Tablet
description: Versatile tablet with a 10.1-inch display, 64GB storage, 4GB RAM, and support for stylus input, ideal for work and entertainment.

name: Gaming Console
description: Next-gen gaming console with 4K gaming, 1TB storage, and a wide range of exclusive games for an immersive experience.

name: Bluetooth Speaker
description: Portable Bluetooth speaker with deep bass, water-resistant design, and 12-hour battery life, perfect for outdoor use.

name: Fitness Tracker
description: Compact fitness tracker with heart rate monitoring, sleep tracking, step counting, and waterproof design, ideal for active users.

name: Camera
description: High-end DSLR camera with 24MP sensor, 4K video recording, and interchangeable lenses for capturing stunning photos and videos.

name: VR Headset
description: Immersive VR headset with a wide field of view, high resolution, and motion tracking, offering a next-level virtual reality experience.
